subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bernie Williams, who appears to be finished in the Bronx, and Hank Bauer, who died last week, are from different eras but each is a Yankee to remember in a different way.
snippet: Bernie Williams, who appears to be finished in the Bronx, and Hank Bauer, who died last week, are from different eras but each is a Yankee to remember in a different way.
